info.name: Giladiskon Supplier Manager - API Documentation
info.description: This page contains information about the APIs we use to integrate with **Giladiskon.com**. Here you can **Get Product List, Import Products, Get the Product Detail, Generate a Voucher to an External Voucher, Get External Voucher Detail,** and **Get All External Vouchers List**. The requests are in the form of JSON which contains a request in the form of a Graphql query. There will be a variable list in every API to contain the required values to run the API.

exec: pm.variables.set('limit', 0) // default to 0, 0 mean no limit

request.description:
Import Products from Get Product List into our database.

Variable List for request body:

| **Variables** | **Attributes** | **Types** | **Default** | **Description** |
| --- | --- | --- | --- | --- |
| schemaName | required | string | "default" |  |
| readCacheFirst | optional | boolean | false | Decide whether read data products from cache or hit the Get Product List API. For Import Products, the value has to be false because we have to get the latest Products List. |
| cacheExpireInSec | optional | number | 1 |  |
| limit | optional | number | 0 | Limit data that will bw inserted to database. 0 means no limit |
| sort | optional | string | "lastUpdateDate" |  |

Get All Products

Variable List for request body:

| **Variables** | **Attributes** | **Types** | **Default** | **Description** |
| --- | --- | --- | --- | --- |
| schemaName | required | string | "default" |  |
| readCacheFirst | optional | boolean | false | Decide whether read data products from cache or hit the Get Product List API. For Import Products, the value has to be false because we have to get the latest Products List. |
| cacheExpireInSec | optional | number | 1 |  |
| limit | optional | number | 0 | Limit data that will bw inserted to database. 0 means no limit |
| sort | optional | string | "lastUpdateDate" |  |
| offset | optional | number | 0 |  |
| latlong | optional | string | "-6.1805729, 106.7914027" | Latitude and longitude to find nearby vouchers |
| distance | optional | number | 50 | To be set when latlong is set. If not set when latlong is set, it will default to 1KM |

Get All External Vouchers that has been generated  
Variable List for request body:

| **Variables** | **Attributes** | **Types** | **Default** | **Description** |
| --- | --- | --- | --- | --- |
| offset | optional | number | 0 |  |
| limit | optional | number | 0 | limit data that will bw inserted to database. 0 means no limit |

response.name: Get All External Vouchers
response.body:
{"data":{"getAllExternalVoucher":"{\"status\":\"success\",\"productType\":\"voucher\",\"timeStamp\":\"\",\"message\":{\"en-us\":[\"Berhasil mendapatkan data external voucher code\"]},\"rawData\":{\"origSupplierResponse\":{\"status\":\"success\",\"message\":[\"Berhasil mendapatkan data external voucher code\"],\"results\":[{\"id\":866,\"partner_user_id\":866,\"partner_id\":7,\"voucher_id\":920,\"voucher_code_id\":815261,\"external_voucher_code\":\"135ab24b-0ee7-4097-89e6-60edd8fd9f04\",\"status\":\"1\",\"used_date\":null,\"created_at\":\"2021-07-30 12:22:32\",\"creator_id\":10,\"editor_id\":10,\"merchant_id\":242,\"creator_id_temp\":\"10\",\"slug\":\"martabak-casablanca-promo-voucher-buy-1-get-1-free\",\"name\":\"Martabak Casablanca Promo Voucher Buy 1 Get 1 FREE!\",\"description\":\"

Hai sweet tooth, ada promo buy 1 get 1 FREE nih dari Martabak Casablanca Setiabudi. Jadi, cukup dengan membeli 1 martabak ovomaltine jumbo, maka, kamu akan mendapatkan 1 martabak nutella jumbo secara GRATIS, special untuk member Giladiskon.

\\r\\n

Ayo segera tukarkan voucher ini di Martabak Casablanca Setiabudi untuk mendapatkan promo buy 1 get 1 FREE.

\\r\\n

 

\\r\\n

Promo yang didapatkan:

\\r\\n
    \\r\\n
  • Buy 1 get 1 FREE (beli 1 martabak ovomaltine jumbo, GRATIS 1 martabak nutella jumbo)
    • \\r\\n
\",\"url\":null,\"type\":\"special\",\"minimum_buy\":null,\"generate_code\":\"0\",\"image_thumbnail\":6682,\"term\":\"
    \\r\\n
  1. \\r\\n

    Customer WAJIB menunjukkan promo ini pada petugas/kasir Martabak Casablanca di hari kedatangan;

    \\r\\n
    2. \\r\\n
  2. \\r\\n

    Promo hanya berlaku untuk seluruh member Giladiskon;

    \\r\\n
    3. \\r\\n
  3. \\r\\n

    Customer WAJIB menunjukan kode voucher yang di-redeem kepada petugas/kasir;

    \\r\\n
    4. \\r\\n
  4. \\r\\n

    Petugas/kasir kemudian mencatat nomor/kode kupon, kemudian petugas/kasir WAJIB menekan klik pada kolom SELESAI di hp customer sebagai bukti bahwa voucher ini telah digunakan oleh customer;

    \\r\\n
    5. \\r\\n
  5. Promo ini hanya berlaku di outlet yang tertera;
    6. \\r\\n
  6. Kamu mendapatkan promo buy 1 get 1 FREE (beli 1 martabak ovomaltine jumbo, GRATIS 1 martabak nutella jumbo);
    7. \\r\\n
  7. Promo ini tidak dapat diuangkan dan digabung dengan promo lainnya;
    8. \\r\\n
  8. Metode pembayaran yang diterima dapat menyesuaikan pada ketersediaan di outlet;
    9. \\r\\n
  9. Satu member dapat menggunakan promo ini sebanyak 3 kali perhari selama periode promo berlangsung (bila ingin menggunakan voucher ini kembali, mohon tunggu 1x24 jam setelah voucher terakhir digunakan).
    10. \\r\\n

request.description:

Variable List for request body:

| **Variables** | **Attributes** | **Types** | **Default** | **Description** |
| --- | --- | --- | --- | --- |
| external_voucher_code | required | string |  | External Voucher Code which is obtained from Get All External Vouchers and created in Generate Voucher Code. |

response.name: Get External Voucher Detail
response.body: {"data":{"getExternalVoucherDetail":"{\"status\":\"error\",\"productType\":\"voucher\",\"timeStamp\":\"\",\"message\":{\"en-us\":{\"external_voucher_code\":[\"The selected external voucher code is invalid.\"]}},\"rawData\":{\"origSupplierResponse\":{\"status\":\"error\",\"message\":{\"external_voucher_code\":[\"The selected external voucher code is invalid.\"]}}}}"}}

request.description:

Variable List for request body:

| **Variables** | **Attributes** | **Types** | **Default** | **Description** |

| orderId | optional | string |  |  |
| orderItemId | optional | string |  |  |
| id (card) | optional | string |  |  |
| Giladiskon | required | string |  | This is the voucher Id that we check the detail and generate |
| id (user) | optional | string |  |  |
| email | optional | string |  |  |
| nickname | optional | string |  |  |
| familyname | optional | string |  |  |
| givenName | optional | string |  |  |
| number (fields) | optional | string |  |  |
| password | optional | string |  |  |
| expiry | optional | string | null |  |

response.body:
{"data":{"getProductInfo":"{\"status\":\"success\",\"productType\":\"voucher\",\"customerId\":\"082234413346\",\"timeStamp\":\"\",\"message\":{\"en-us\":[\"get voucher detail\"]},\"rawData\":{\"origSupplierResponse\":{\"status\":\"success\",\"message\":[\"get voucher detail\"],\"results\":{\"id\":911,\"slug\":\"raja-sei-promo-buy-2-get-1-free\",\"name\":\"Raja Se'i Promo Buy 2 Get 1 FREE!\",\"type\":\"special\",\"max_used\":1,\"period\":\"day\",\"total_stock\":200,\"current_stock\":195,\"expired_date\":\"2021-06-30 23:59:59\",\"start_price\":114000,\"final_price\":76000,\"saving_value\":38000,\"description\":\"

Pecinta Se'i mana suaranyaaa??

\\r\\n

Yass, Raja Se'i hadir di Voucher Giladiskon dengan promo buy 2 get 1 FREE untuk pembelian menu Se'i Combo, special untuk member Giladiskon.

\\r\\n

Yuk, segera tukarkan voucher Giladiskon ini di outlet Raja Se'i Kemang.

\\r\\n

 

\\r\\n

Promo yang kamu dapatkan:

\\r\\n
    \\r\\n
  • Voucher Buy 2 Get 1 FREE untuk menu Se'i Combo di Raja Se'i Kemang
    • \\r\\n
\",\"term\":\"
    \\r\\n
  1. \\r\\n

    Customer WAJIB menunjukkan promo ini pada petugas/kasir Raja Se'i di hari kedatangan sebelum bertransaksi ;

    \\r\\n
    2. \\r\\n
  2. \\r\\n

    Promo hanya berlaku untuk member Giladiskon;

    \\r\\n
    3. \\r\\n
  3. \\r\\n

    Customer WAJIB menunjukan kode voucher yang di-redeem kepada petugas/kasir;

    \\r\\n
    4. \\r\\n
  4. Customer akan mendapatkan promo buy 2 get 1 FREE yang berlaku untuk menu Se'i Combo (beli 2 porsi, gratis 1 porsi);
    5. \\r\\n
  5. \\r\\n

    Petugas/kasir kemudian scan kode kupon/barcode, kemudian petugas/kasir WAJIB menekan klik pada kolom SELESAI di hp customer sebagai bukti bahwa voucher ini telah digunakan oleh customer;

    \\r\\n
    6. \\r\\n
  6. Voucher tidak dapat digabungkan dengan promo lainnya, seperti promo paket/harga special lainnya;
    7. \\r\\n
  7. Voucher Buy 2 Get 1 FREE hanya berlaku di outlet Raja Se'i Kemang;
    8. \\r\\n
  8. \\r\\n

    Metode pembayaran yang diterima yaitu uang tunai, debit BCA, OVO, DANA, & Shopeepay;

    \\r\\n
    9. \\r\\n
  9. \\r\\n

    Satu member dapat menggunakan promo ini sebanyak 1 kali perhari selama periode promo berlangsung (bila ingin menggunakan voucher ini kembali, mohon tunggu 1x24 jam setelah voucher terakhir digunakan).

    \\r\\n
    10. \\r\\n
